meanings.definition: Not having been reached or achieved.
meanings.sent1: The top shelf was unreached by the little girl.
meanings.sent2: The treasure remained unreached at the bottom of the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The cookie jar was unreached by the mischievous puppy.
meanings.sent4: The stars seemed unreached, hanging high in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The dream of becoming an astronaut felt unreached but within grasp.

meanings.sent1: The lost hiker was unreached by the search party.
meanings.sent2: The distant planet remained unreached by human spacecraft.
meanings.sent3: The phone call went unreached as the battery died.
meanings.sent4: The isolated island felt unreached by the troubles of the world.
meanings.sent5: The message in a bottle floated unreached on the vast ocean waves.
